Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox led the way with 35 points, three rebounds and four assists
Domantas Sabonis had 17 points, 21 rebounds and seven assists
Paul George had a big game with 30 points, eight rebounds and five assists, but fouled out late
Tyrese Maxey had 27 points, two rebounds, six assists and four steals
Eric Gordon added 14 points off the bench
The Sacramento Kings pulled off a late rally to beat the Philadelphia 76ers 113-107
Malik Monk gave the Kings a two-point lead after his layup was blocked by Guerschon Yabusele, but was called a goaltending
Monk and DeMar DeRozan iced the game from the free throw line
Pre-Game Insights: The Sacramento Kings were coming off interim coach Doug Christie's first victory, defeating the Dallas Mavericks on Monday
The Philadelphia 76ers were trying to extend their winning streak to five games
Post-Match Reflections: It was a great win for Sacramento, lighting the beam to start 2025
DeMar DeRozan iced the game from the free throw line to give interim coach Doug Christie his second career win
